name: how to befriend a vampire
description:
• music by louie zong
  • background photo by vincent sanga
  • (and i forgot to specify this in the game itself, but) character designed in gaia online

a sort of educational game i dreamed up for the twine survival guide jam 2021. the embed has music in it but i included a version without, just in case. if you learned how to survive anything from this, or if you find any bugs, please let me know. thank you for playing!
